portfolio_summary.commentary_and_market_outlook: The portfolio delivered a solid return of +7.5% year-to-date, driven by strong performance in our equity holdings, particularly in technology and consumer discretionary sectors. Apple (AAPL) and Microsoft (MSFT) were standout performers, contributing to over 20% of the portfolio's total gains. The robust growth in these companies reflects the ongoing global demand for cloud services and consumer electronics.

trade_execution_summary.performance_overview: some more words of wisdom about the performance, which I highly do not recommend

rules: No more than 80% of portfolio in equities
